    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: from . import util
    4: 
    5: 
    6: class TestValueAttr(util.F2PyTest):
    7:     sources = [util.getpath("tests", "src", "value_attrspec", "gh21665.f90")]
    8: 
    9:     # gh-21665
   10:     @pytest.mark.slow
   11:     def test_gh21665(self):
   12:         inp = 2
   13:         out = self.module.fortfuncs.square(inp)
   14:         exp_out = 4
   15:         assert out == exp_out
